subtitles:
185476 188145 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188229 191315 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

192149 194819 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209041 211544 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

220011 222847 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

222930 226767 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

226851 232106 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

232190 235651 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244243 247413 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249540 253836 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
253920 255505 We'll get you out of here.

255588 260259 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277610 279737 Get it off! Get it off!

283366 286577 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295253 298464 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004128 1007006 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015139 1017725 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046379 1048631 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078619 1083374 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085543 1090756 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1090840 1094886 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1105479 1108399 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115198 1118701 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123289 1129712 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1129795 1133549 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159116 1165373 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165456 1169627 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170503 1173256 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1173339 1178052 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1181931 1184767 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187395 1189897 There was something in the blood.

1191357 1196320 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203452 1206164 And that's when the exodus started.

1210376 1214046 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216424 1219343 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222305 1225266 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227894 1231981 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232064 1236360 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237820 1240907 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241532 1245703 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264096 1268100 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268184 1270770 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285535 1289956 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292458 1296546 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300716 1304303 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1318985 1322154 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486527 1490489 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1496954 1501459 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504086 1509425 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510051 1512428 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512512 1515848 even though cash was completely useless.
1517391 1520520 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1526067 1528402 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530571 1532907 I remember the ground was soft.

1534867 1539247 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539330 1543292 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543376 1547338 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547421 1550758 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552385 1555471 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555555 1557932 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560226 1565189 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1565273 1569151 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583249 1588421 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591090 1593926 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1594010 1597346 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1700032 1702326 Give me a drink of that, will ya?

1746746 1749707 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749790 1752001 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755254 1758174 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796045 1798130 Do you have any clothes here?

1801217 1804887 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1804971 1808641 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837420 1840423 (Jim) How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840506 1844427 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844510 1849891 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1849974 1854395 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854478 1859609 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859692 1865114 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865198 1869410 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869494 1873956 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1876626 1879212 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1937937 1941065 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941148 1944235 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962170 1964255 Now I do need a break.

1984025 1989322 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990531 1994785 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997079 1999332 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999415 2004504 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010218 2013262 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2090631 2093634 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093718 2096012 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129420 2132507 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147772 2150066 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150149 2153194 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153277 2156239 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156322 2158825 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2169794 2172797 - (Frank) Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172880 2175758 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198531 2201617 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230438 2236027 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237695 2239947 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246496 2249123 Have to empty it each morning.

2249207 2252877 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254754 2257882 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2271229 2273606 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310309 2314021 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315147 2317984 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329287 2333958 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2334041 2337795 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342258 2345803 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2361861 2365114 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2366991 2370995 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403194 2405279 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405363 2409492 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409575 2412787 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429262 2433516 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2433599 2437353 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2453411 2456539 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2465464 2469218 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469302 2473890 (man on radio) Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2473973 2476976 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477059 2481564 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481647 2483858 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487320 2491908 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495495 2499415 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499499 2501876 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2501959 2504879 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508633 2513429 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519310 2525399 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525483 2528653 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2528736 2531239 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531322 2535284 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537161 2541457 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541541 2545044 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2545127 2549423 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549507 2552343 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552426 2556514 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2560977 2566691 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570153 2575449 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576159 2578244 So we have to try and get there.

2592383 2596137 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624707 2627710 - (Frank) What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627793 2633049 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650650 2653152 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654028 2657406 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657490 2661869 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2661953 2664872 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700533 2702952 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703035 2706372 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2708875 2711043 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725641 2729187 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761177 2765473 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765556 2768809 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775274 2780404 - (Selena) Don't look at them! Don't look!
- (Jim) I can see them! They're coming!

2791290 2794210 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807598 2810059 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886552 2890139 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890223 2892058 I think you can eat that raw.

2899732 2904237 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2908950 2912578 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920670 2923923 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2978811 2981898 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034116 3036786 (quietly) Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3134926 3137720 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213671 3216674 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217508 3220303 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281614 3285326 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285409 3289580 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290623 3294460 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3305429 3307723 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319152 3323656 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325032 3328494 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331164 3334792 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.

3358691 3362695 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391015 3393684 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410493 3414372 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414455 3418751 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421462 3424048 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424131 3427844 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427927 3430179 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442650 3445361 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446445 3450449 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527360 3530154 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585459 3588963 - Did I miss breakfast?
- (Selena) You'll sleep through anything.

3589046 3594051 - (Jim) Did you have a fry-up?
- (Frank) We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618618 3623122 (radio) Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3669961 3673339 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675174 3677510 No fire crews to put it out.

3808474 3812478 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812562 3815690 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822530 3827368 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943776 3946696 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946779 3949282 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012512 4015181 (man) Three survivors. One male, two female.
4015264 4018601 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083416 4088296 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088379 4090798 So you can all have a shower.
4090882 4094218 You look like you need one. Please.

4114155 4119368 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128169 4131339 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143643 4147230 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151067 4156072 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156155 4160076 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161369 4163788 I want her to be OK.
4165373 4167542 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167625 4170419 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210543 4214046 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214130 4220261 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222680 4226851 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231355 4235860 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236235 4239155 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239238 4242366 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242450 4245536 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255588 4261469 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265181 4269435 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269519 4274190 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277443 4282365 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282448 4284867 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284951 4290206 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292458 4294585 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294669 4297880 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4297964 4302009 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304554 4307557 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4331956 4337044 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344719 4348764 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371454 4374874 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386511 4391891 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431639 4434100 ? You'll have to wait and see
4436519 4439105 ? We hope it's chips, it's chips
4455496 4458875 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466465 4468926 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4469010 4472221 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472305 4475433 but this omelette will do just as well.

4490990 4494911 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4494994 4498414 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505379 4508174 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509008 4514472 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514555 4519101 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519185 4522438 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522522 4525358 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525441 4529487 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529570 4533908 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4533991 4537119 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539205 4543334 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544085 4546546 So if the infection wipes us all out,

4553845 4556848 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4556931 4560184 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563062 4568276 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571070 4575199 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4577994 4582540 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4582623 4588087 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588171 4591799 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600099 4603060 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606022 4609275 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610193 4613321 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617408 4619452 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671254 4674882 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691566 4693860 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716507 4722138 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4722221 4724432 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726225 4731522 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733149 4735318 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741532 4746037 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753753 4756797 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756881 4760343 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770812 4773523 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776400 4778986 The rest of you, go with him.

4801384 4805596 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805680 4807223 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807306 4812478 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819735 4822864 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834500 4839297 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860276 4864071 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865239 4869952 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870036 4872914 What could I say to him?

4872997 4878211 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879128 4882965 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883049 4889180 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906739 4908533 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908616 4910701 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916833 4918793 We get in the car and we go!

4920169 4924715 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4924799 4928052 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928136 4930847 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4944777 4947113 I want to give you a chance.
4950950 4953244 But I can't let them go.

4981314 4984066 (Farrell) Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4984150 4987069 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4987153 4990072 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990156 4993784 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993868 4998289 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998372 5001667 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001751 5007465 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008508 5012553 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013930 5017058 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018100 5020394 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020478 5024774 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024857 5027568 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027652 5031656 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5035952 5039539 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048297 5052677 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

5099223 5102351 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103436 5108566 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108649 5112570 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116407 5118493 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143476 5146896 (Farrell) Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5146979 5149482 (Jones) No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149565 5152610 - (Farrell) So you're gonna stick me?
- (Jones) Shoot 'em!

5155446 5158491 (Farrell) Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158574 5160493 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160576 5164038 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173339 5177301 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177385 5181556 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182807 5185643 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188146 5191357 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201117 5203035 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218509 5221971 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261010 5264972 (West) The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265056 5268643 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268726 5271270 which she certainly has no use for.
5272271 5274106 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274190 5277902 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291415 5294210 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294293 5297630 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316399 5320528 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322405 5326117 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326200 5330371 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354145 5357023 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380087 5384050 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384133 5386302 Are you trying to kill me?
5388721 5391265 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403236 5405905 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411744 5414330 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644393 5646854 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647897 5651859 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654612 5657240 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670419 5672922 I think they're having an effect.

5688479 5691357 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5692108 5695194 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695278 5697280 Is that the way it works?

5700825 5704912 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5723848 5726976 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727059 5729896 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5751959 5757507 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765473 5768851 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791290 5794252 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5820820 5824574 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003294 6007673 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071070 6075867 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6075950 6080413 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080496 6082832 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147188 6149690 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6163955 6167500 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173256 6175758 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6175842 6179178 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187687 6191274 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191357 6193442 But I thought he was biting you.
6193526 6196195 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198531 6200658 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6298965 6301384 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395102 6397772 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419418 6422755 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478227 6481147 Do you think he saw us this time?
